page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content:
This 4x3 km block lies in the county of Essex, on the N.E. edge of the Greater London conurbation. It is in part a residential area, with people who work locally and many who commute to central London.
The area includes all, or part of, the following communities: Hainault, Chigwell, Chigwell Row and Grange Hill.
Because we are on the edge of the countryside, farming is also important in our area, particularly to the North and East. A large area, Hainault Forest, is maintained as a country park.
Finally, there is an industrial estate in the S.E. corner of our survey area.
